name: mndmgm

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c0, cmgm), wcel(c0, csgrp))
stmt.pretty: syl(c0 ∈ Mnd, c0 ∈ Mgm, c0 ∈ SGrp)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c0, cmgm))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c0, csgrp))
-| wi(wcel(c0, csgrp), wcel(c0, cmgm))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ Mnd → c0 ∈ Mgm)
⊣ (c0 ∈ Mnd → c0 ∈ SGrp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ SGrp → c0 ∈ Mgm)

cumulated.origin:

-| wi(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c0, csgrp))
-| wi(wcel(c0, csgrp), wcel(c0, cmgm))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ Mnd → c0 ∈ Mgm)
⊣ (c0 ∈ Mnd → c0 ∈ SGrp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ SGrp → c0 ∈ Mgm)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c0, cmgm))
-| wi(wcel(c0, csgrp), wcel(c0, cmgm))
cumulated.pretty:

comment: A monoid is a magma. (Contributed by FL, 2-Nov-2009.) (Revised by AV, 6-Jan-2020.) (Proof shortened by AV, 6-Feb-2020.)
